choose your character.
After each character a bio about them must made before jumping into the story.
1.title: Choose your character

11.content:
Eyes:red
Hair:Brown
Species:Dracowolf.
Age:16
Phoenixgod was a dracowolf born with the dangerous 18-tailed phoenix spirit.
He is a master of all elements.
But he uses his powers for good.
He is one individual you don't want to mess with.
You mess with his friends,you mess with him.
Due to the phoenix spirit he is immortal.
11.title: phoenixgod

111.content:
You are walking on Earth for your Daily stroll, when you see a saiyan with spikey hair.
"Hi there, I'm Goku" Goku says.
"I am phoenix von Dragaic VII" you say
"but call me phoenixgod."
ALL of a sudden goku's son runs in.
"Dad,can we do some training?"
"Later Gohan, I am trying to get to know phoenixgod better."
"Hi there, I am gohan, and as you can see I am goku's son."
"Later, I will introduce you to my friends"
111.title: Goku

12.content:
Your name is Drago.
Your species is an Anthro Dragon.
You have trained many years under the Great Dragon Spirit.
You do not necessarily fight for Good or Evil.
Or whoever get in your way.
You have your own justice.
You are believed to be undefeatable.
Who gets in your way?
12.title: Dragoshane

121.content:
You are training when you hear someone coming.
You stand on a rock and tell him to get out of here.
Hold I dont want any problem said the sayan.
It was Goku.
How about we fight.Said Goku.
Now you`re talking.
As soon as the battle begins you begin to watch Goku`s movements.
He began a variety of punches and kicks.
When he finishes he sees that you blocked each one.
Whoa you`re not just some rookie are you.
You smile.
I didnt want to do this.Goku said.
He began to be enveloped by a bright light.
He became a super sayan.
He flew into the air and he put both hands down beside his waist.
Kamehame ha.
He shouted as a large blue beam flew from his hands.
Oh please you say.
Dragon Fire.You shout.
A lare flame in the shape of a dragon flys from your hands.
It challenges Goku`s attack in mid air.
Who wins?
121.title: Goku

14.content:
Name: Alex
Species: Human
Age: 16 yet appears to be about 13 or 12
Power level: thought to be that of a normal
Personality: Kind hearted and loyal
Fear: He will one day lose himself to a dark evil that of which he will not be able to escape
Home town: North City
Relatives: Unknown Mother and Father, he lives alone but believes that he will one day meet his parents
Appearance: He has short spiked dirty blond hair and wears a two light green arm bands on the lower part of his arms, just before each of his hands. Both arm bands have a simple but noticeable icon of a yellow star on the front of them. Alex wears a dark blue jacket that a kind woman with blue hair bought for him along with a white T-shirt underneath it. He wears grey silky shorts that he finds quiet comfortable. Alex wears black sneakers which have a slight metal tip in the front of the shoe just in case he needs that extra kick.

Today is the day his life is going to change but first during what saga is this going to take place...
14.title: New character: Alex

choices: The story of the strange friendship
145.content:
Good I have two scenarios already prepared.

Number 1 takes place in the alternate future where Future Trunks is from only it takes place during the time Trunks is gone

Or

Number 2 is a bit different as this one has Alex befriending two of the DBZ world’s most powerful villains yet somehow the villains are not themselves anymore

So what’ll it be? #1 OR #2?
145.title: Alternate universe scenario...

choices: Alex decides to take Cell with him to live with him in North City...
1452.content:
“*Yawn*…good morning” Alex yawned as he awoke in his room on another sunny day in North City. He climbs out of bed of his apartment before exiting the room. He scratches his head still half asleep before accidently running into someone. Alex falls on his back in groans in pain before he looks up to see who he ran into; it was Mr. Jeice of the Ginyu Force. The Ginyu force was a sort of police organization made up of five members all of who had extraordinary powers.

“Oh hello there Alex ‘ow’s it been” Mr. Jeice says greeting Alex.

“Oh Mr. Jeice good morning” Alex says standing back up.

“So what are you up to today” Mr. Jeice asked casually?

“Oh just heading outside for a morning walk. What about you? How’s your partner Burter doing” Alex asked? Jeice smiles and pats Alex on the back and laughs.

“Ah Alex always worrying about others ain’t ya” Jeice said admiring Alex’s compassion. “He’s doing well. In fact he actually is outside waiting for me so we can go on patrol right now. SO I gotta go. See ya Later Alex” Jeice waves before walking off towards the elevator.

“Later Mr. Jeice” Alex waves to his friend before proceeding downstairs via the stairs, passing by several people on the way until he finally arrived at the entrance of the hotel. He told the attendant that he was going out and that he was going to be going on a morning walk. The woman smiled and nodded then waved as Alex walked off.

Outside Alex was enjoying his morning walk before something caught his eye, an old man with long white hair and a black hat with a red bow insignia that had the initials RR on it stealthily walk into an abandoned alley. Curious Alex followed after the man only to see the man suddenly take off into the sky to Alex’s amazement. He had seen Mr. Jeice and his partner Burter fly before but that was on rare occasions. This man seemed mysterious and Alex was bound determined to find out who he was and what he was up to. He quickly climbed the chain link fence in front of him and watched closely as the man flew in the sky unaware he was being followed. Soon after an hour of chase Alex arrived in the mountains of North City which were claimed highly dangerous due to nearly constant rock slides and weather. This however did not deter Alex as he pressed on, determination fueling him full of courage.

Eventually Alex arrived at the top of the mountain and quickly hides behind a large boulder as the old man was stand only a few feet away, facing the rock wall. Alex looked on to see the old man move a piece of rock aside to reveal a small security device. The old man quickly imputes a code which Alex memorizes as 0020 the suddenly the rock wall before him begins to move away and reveals a cave to Alex’s astonishment.

“Whoa” Alex gaps out before suddenly the old man turns around and suddenly shoots out two twin lasers from his eye that pierce straight threw the rock Alex was hiding behind, thankfully Alex dodged the attack by ducking just as the lasers hit the rock.

“Huh whoever they were they’re dead now” the old man said emotionlessly before proceeding into the cave. As the old man was now in the cave the wall shut behind him as if they had never moved. Alex waited a few minutes before approaching the door and then typed in the code into the security device. Once more the door slide open like it did with the old man and Alex carefully proceeded inside.

Deep inside the complex Alex now found himself arriving at a large room with three pods each marked with a double digit.

“16…17…and 18? Wonder what these are” Alex thought aloud before he approached one of the containers and peers into the window on the container marked 18. To Alex’s shock he finds a girl but it seems like she was dead or something as when Alex put his ear to the container he couldn’t hear anything, not even a faint heart beat.

“So I see that little blast of mine didn’t kill you. What a pest you humans are” a familiar emotionless say as Alex turns his back to see the old man from before.

“Oh uh sorry I thought this was the bathroom. My mistake” Alex lies trying to get out of this situation but the old man didn’t buy his excuse.

“How stupid do you think I am? You simply wandered into the cave after typing in the security code. Looks like I have to exterminate you” the old man said as a he charges a ball of energy in his hand. Alex sweat drops in fear before the old man launches his attack at Alex only for Alex to jump out of the way and to hit the container much to the old man’s shock and frustration. “You brat you’ll pay for that” the old man yells as he continues to blast at Alex as he runs down the hall. The blasts of energy hit the walls and cause a cave in cutting the old man off from Alex and vice versa. The old man satisfied, thinking Alex was killed, turns back to the pods and begins to fix the container he had accidently shot.

On the other side Alex groaned awake as the blast had sent him down into a secret basement area of which Alex soon decided to explore. Upon further exploration Alex found himself before a large incubator looking object that held in it what seemed like a fetus of some sort. Alex tapped at the glass a few times wondering if the thing inside would respond. After a few seconds Alex shrugged and turned his back to the creature as he looked at the large computer before him.

“Wow I’ve never see such a huge computer before” Alex said in awe as he approached that of the old man’s super computer who was designed to create androids that would be used to destroy the world. His curiousity leading him on he pressed several buttons as several things flashed on screen. One window read in bright red color “Danger! Releasing process activated! Project Cell will be awoken shortly!” Alex didn’t know what he had done so he kept pressing buttons hoping to stop his mistake but it just made things worse as another window popped up and read “Protocol erased! Critical ERROR! DANGER! DANGER…!”

Behind Alex, the creature inside the incubator was stirring. Its eyes flashed open as it looked around franticly before it laid eyes on Alex. Alex whirled around in shock to fond the incubator cracking. He rushed forward in a fruitless attempt to stop the inevitable but soon it broke as the creature along with the green fluid drenched Alex.

“*Cough*cough* what the heck? Why does all this stuff have to happen to me” Alex groaned as he stood up.

“NO! What have you done” shouted an angered but familiar voice! The old man had returned and this time he was pissed! “My creation! You’ve destroyed it! GAH! I’m going to rip you to pieces boy” the old man shouted as he charged two balls of energy in his hand.

“No please don’t kill me. I don’t want to die” Alex cried out as he closed his eyes to his murderer. Suddenly something strange began to occur, on Alex’s arm, under his sleeve there the fetus creature was before it suddenly shot out of Alex’s arm and onto the old man much to his shock.

“What the…? No! You’re suppose to absorb Androids 17 and 18 not me” the old man cried before suddenly the fetus creature darted into the old man’s mouth hand then quickly down his throat. Suddenly the creature began to undergo a strange sort of metamorphosis and then suddenly the old man exploded in a blast of energy. Alex fearing for his life opened his eyes to see a new being before him. It was about the same size as Alex who was the size of an average human kid and looked like a strange insect like monster. It had a needle tipped tall of which it wagged in the air. It’s eyes were blood red and menacing but strangely enough the monster did not attack Alex but instead asked a kind hearted question.

“Are you okay” it asked? Alex gulped in fear but then shoved away his fear and replied.

“I’m alright. What’s you name” Alex asked?

“I am the artificial life form know as Cell. I was created by Dr. Gero but that is all I know. You seemed to have somehow erased my former programming” the creature explains. Alex smiles and then laughs.

"Well than I guess I should thank you for saving me" Alex says with a laugh.

"You're welcome. But what do I do now? I have no programing to drive me and my creator only programed me for that one function" Cell asked destrot?
1452.title: The fortunate accident...

choices: Alex awakens to see Cell and he explains what happened while Alex was out...
Another individual of the Ginyu force arrives to fight Cell to his frustration…
14521.content:
Alex thinks for a bit and paces the room as Cell watches him before suddenly Alex snaps around having come up with an idea. Alex smiles largely much to Cell’s surprise before he speaks.

“I’ve got it! You can come live with me in north city” Alex exclaims! Cell doesn’t know what to think and shrugs. After all he didn’t know much other than his own name and who created him. He figured it was best to go along with his new friend until he knew enough to live on his own.

“Alright than shall we get going” Cell asked and Alex nodded before Cell began to levitate into the air much to Alex’s shock and awe.

“Whoa you can fly” Alex cries in shock?!

“Huh” Cell asks confused not realizing he was levitating? Cell quickly looks down to see that he was in fact flying much to his own shock and awe before he floated back to the ground. Alex was amazed and cheered as Cell looked at his hands and asked “What other hidden powers do I possess?” Alex smiled and walked up to Cell then patted him on the back with a laugh.

“Whatever they are I’m sure we’ll figure them out together buddy” Alex says smiling.

“Right well I guess we should get going now” Cell asks and Alex nods before he once again begins to levitate only this time Alex was on his back as he couldn’t fly. “Hold on tight” Cell ordered before jetting off at incredible speed, out of the cave where he was born and into the wide open world. He marveled at the amazement and beauty of this new world as Alex laughs at being up so high. Cell stopping for a moment asks Alex where his home was and Alex quickly pointed out the large city below them. Cell quickly dive bombs much to Alex amazement that he could go so fast before soon landing in the middle of town, surprising several human citizens.

“What is that thing” a scare woman citizen said scared of Cell’s monstrous appearance.

“I don’t know but call the Ginyu Force” order another scare civilian.

Alex and Cell didn’t know what to think and watched as the civilians paniced and ran away before suddenly a large muscular person with red hair arrived on seen. It was that of Recoome of the Ginyu Force. Recoome was one of the most powerful members of the Ginyu Force but he didn’t know Alex so it made what was about to happen pointless.

“Oh hello there Mr. Recoome. Sorry about the trouble but I was just on my way home wit-“

“Shut up kid and get out of the way” Recoome screams angrily as he uses his famous Recoome Kick to punt Alex aside, knocking the kid unconscious.

“No Alex” Cell cries as he watches his friend fly then smash into a tree with enough force to break the tree along with several of Alex’s ribs. Cell quickly tries to run over to Alex but is blocked by Recoome much to his frustration.

“Where do you think you’re going you little pest” Recoome laughs before punching Cell in the chest. Cell to, Recoome’s surprise, doesn’t move but grunts a bit in pain. “Huh what happened? That punch should have sent yah flyin” Recoome asks confused before suddenly Cell shoots his tail out and stabs Recoome straight in the chest piercing one of his lungs. Recoome in response coughs up blood and gasps out an insult before successfully punt kicking Cell into the air. Cell recovers and floats in the air before Recoome charges at him with a vial murderous intent. Cell roars out in anger sending out a huge wave of hidden power, frightening Recoome enough for him to back off a few feet but not enough for him to run away.

“You’re going to pay for hurting my friend! You think I’m a monster well than I guess I’ll be a monster! Now die” Cell shouts as he puts his hands behind his back and begins to chant. Recoome realizing what was going to happen quickly charges at Cell while he chants. “Ka…me…hame…” Cell chanted as suddenly a blue light began to emit from his hand.

“Oh no you don’t” Recoome yells as he punches at Cell only for cell to transport behind the muscle bound bastard and speak the last part of the chant before he flashed his hands forward.

“HA!” Cell yells unleashing a huge blast of blue energy at Recoome sending him flying into the air not to mention causing massive damage to him. Recoome soars high into the air out of view as Cell gasp for breath as the attack had taken its toll not only on Recoome but on Cell as well. Cell quickly descends to the ground where Alex laid unconscious as several other humans marvel in awe and fear at the destructive power the monster before them held.

“No even the mighty Recoome could stop that monster” Cell looks at the humans before him and glares angrily.

“You humans are all the same! Pathetic and weak! Scared of the unknown and attack without rationality” Cell insults “You sicken me!” Cell then takes Alex in his arms and flies up into the air. Cell looks around and soon finds what humans call a hospital and flies off towards the nearest one. Back at the park the humans were stunned at the sight and were counting their blessings that they weren’t dead when suddenly a large object came crashing down on the center of the park. In its wake a huge crater was formed. A curious human went to investigate and found that of Recoome who to an even great surprise was still alive and breathing! It seemed that the monster, be it very angry and evil looking, didn’t take the life of his attacker.

On the other side of town Cell had arrive at the hospital and received many of the same reactions from citizens as with those in the park. Cell groans annoyed and ignores them and entered the hospital. He receives much of the same reactions from patients and staff alike before he arrives at the front desk. The woman there stutters as she speaks, scared of Cell like everyone else.

“*sigh* why does this happen everywhere I go” Cell sighs annoyed before looking the attendant dead in the eye and requesting her to treat Alex.

“Yo…You want me to t..treat you friend” the nurse stutters scared of what cell might do to her if she doesn’t comply. The nurse reaches under her desk and presses a red button sending for security much to Cell’s further annoyance. Cell sighs again and then dispatches the guards with his tail, knocking them unconscious, seeing as killing them more than likely would cause more trouble. “No human I will repeat myself once again. Heal my friend or I’ll obliterate every single person her, starting with you” cell demands and then Nurse can do nothing but accept and quickly shows Cell to a empty room with a hospital bed and TV.

After a brief wait a doctor arrives at the room to treat Alex. His first thought is that he is being forced to do this and his second thought is to run away!

“Well let’s see…” the doctor says as he takes out his stethoscope and listens to Alex’s heart. He looks up to see Cell’s glaring eyes and quickly jolts up in fear before cell sighs and tells him to continue. The doctor, after examining Alex for several minutes turns to cell and explains Alex’s condition.

“You’re friend here is in surprisingly good health. He seems to be suffering from a bit of cracking on his ribs. What happened exactly to cause such damage? Was he hit by a car or something” the doctor asked Cell?

“He was kicked by that huge monster Recoome or at least that’s what I heard the humans in the park call him. Regardless will my friend be alright” Cell asks? The doctor quickly replies lest he anger Cell any more than he already had.

“He will make a full recovery; surprisingly he is the first person to ever survive a hit from the famous Recoome Kick. His ribs also seem to be healing rather quickly so he should be fine when he wakes up. Till then I suggest we just wait.

Later...
14521.title: Living with Cell...

choices: It was Mr. Jesse. Phew! Things might turn out well then!

15.title: More Characters

151.content:
My Earth name is Blade but truth is, I'm a saiyan. How do I know that? I learned when I was sparring against Goku the first time when I was 10 years old. Strange part is that at the age of 10, my power level was over 100,000. Impossible isn't it. Anyways, I'm 18 now and is training with Goku once again. I defeated Goku the pasted years because of my powerful level. Since I'm 18, I have 450,000 power level. Goku and I have become rivals to fight.

"I'm not holding back!" I yelled

"Bring it on Blade!" Goku yelled back

"KAMEHAMEHAMEHA!!!" Goku and I yelled while blasting it towards each other

"I....."

"Won't...."

"LOSE!!!" Goku and I gave it our all

My power had more to it and was pushing it towards Goku and won the fight. That was a great spar

"It's 15-0, Goku. You haven't beated me once yet" I said

"Yeah which makes you a perfect rival" Goku replied
151.title: Custom Character

Death is allowed as shown in the show.

I will not allow vore.
Enjoy the action
